alert.note: Alert for Bear River Range (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Avalanche Warning issued January 11 at 6:10AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...The Forest Service Utah Avalanche Center in Salt Lake City has CONTINUED an AVALANCHE WARNING which is now in effect until 6 AM MST Friday... * WHAT...The avalanche danger for the warning area is HIGH. * WHERE...Bear River Range in southeast Idaho. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Strong winds and heavy snowfall have created dangerous avalanche conditions. Avalanches failing on a widespread persistent weak layer buried under the new snow are likely. Stay off of and out from under slopes steeper than 30 degrees. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Consult www.utahavalanchecenter.org or www.avalanche.org for more detailed information. Similar avalanche danger may exist at locations outside the coverage area of this or any avalanche center.
